alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hamilton and northeastern Herkimer Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Big Moose, or 10 miles northeast of Old Forge. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inlet, Limekiln Lake Campground, Eagle Bay, Big Moose, Eighth Lake Campground, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Alger Island Public Campground and Russian Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
